title: Children of the Gods
description: For as long as seventeen-year-old Reka Cushing can remember, she has watched her friends and her neighbors be stolen, their bodies used as hosts for the Halorans; an alien race that has come to earth posing as gods. For just as long, Reka has lived in fear of drawing the eye of a Haloran, keeping her head down, hoping not to be caught in their sights.The only time she has ever been bold, tried to get what she wanted, a god, one more powerful, more dangerous than all others is watching
author: Monica Millard
